featured.text: Also, I received this FAX this morning.

Today, beeping alarm clocks and smartphones that play morning music are surely simpler and more convenient.

other.text: I usually eat lunch from twelve to one and generally take a fifteen-minute break in the morning and in the afternoon.

definition.zh_def: 早晨，指一天中從黎明到中午的時間。
definition.en_def: The period of time from sunrise to noon.
definition.example: I like to go for a run in the morning.
